title: Beau'tiful
creator_credit: Sung Khuu, Photographic Imaging College and Dimaze Films
brief_description: A softly humming soundtrack lulls the viewer into a dreamlike state as this experimental student film uses a combination of camera techniques to takes us on an exquisite journey through metaphoric landscapes that explore the nature of human existence.
